title: Identify this font name
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101923im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DS_4472.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101923im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontd_6103.JPG)

Please help me to identify the font name.
author: Lenin

comments.content:
3 different fonts:

"V": **[Augusta](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101923/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Augusta%20-%20Regular&fid=385b2e844755c43a7bf26dbc7de55fd2&fsize=60&text=V&fit=1)** by Typographer Mediengestaltung, 2000  
or **[T4 C Beaulieux](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101923/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Scriptorium-Fonts&ffam=T4C%20Beaulieux%20-%20Regular&fid=ae339f6573211004500406a3eb350541&fsize=60&text=V&fit=1)** by David F. Nalle [Scriptorium-Fonts, 1998]

"C": **Lautenbach** digitized by Dan X. Solo [1998, Dover Publications]

".apor .lean": **[Blade 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20140426101923/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Blade%202%20-%20Regular&fid=fd536d1f23da3a67976f1a10667c8ca8&fsize=60&text=VAPOR%20CLEAN&fit=1)** by Jens R. Ziehn [Free for personal use]
